attributes.action: Stop advertising alcohol on tv and stop showing celebrities on tv showing it
attributes.additional_details: Stop advertising alcohol!! You wouldn’t advertise cocaine! Alcohol is poison and kills people i lmaost died due to being an alcoholic thankfully i seeked help and i am in recovery but watching tv and on gogglebox people casually drinking should be illegal it should be hidden like cigarettes in the convenience stores!
attributes.background: I want the government to stop putting alcohol on the tv like on celebrity gogglebox each celebrity has wine or a pint in plain sight would you allow them to inject heroin or snort cocaine ? Alcohol is poison and as a recovering alcoholic this is a trigger

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710852
